title: The Lost wax method of bronze casting
creator_credit: Leo Steiner, Fotosonic and Harmon Foundation
brief_description: Vincent Kofi, a Ghanian sculptor, is shown making a bronze casting of his “Awakening Africa” using the lost wax method. The process - from modelling the original clay figurine to the finished work on the metal casting - is shown.
